price: Ti wọn ni ìró ìdùnnú nínú ìṣẹ̀mí ayé (yìí) àti ní Ọjọ́ Ìkẹ́yìn. Kò sí ìyípadà kan fún àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ Allāhu.¹ Ìyẹn, òhun ni èrèǹjẹ ńlá.
arabic: لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ni pé, ìgbàkígbà tí àdéhùn Allāhu bá jẹyọ nínú āyah kan, àdéhùn náà kò níí yẹ̀.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lahumu al-bush'rā fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati lā tabdīla likalimāti al-lahi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
